title: Increase Home hero rotating logo element beyond half-page height

requirements.text: Increase the size of the Home page rotating circular hero/logo element so that on desktop it visually occupies clearly more than half of the hero section height (i.e., >50%), while remaining responsive on tablet/mobile and not causing layout overflow or clipping.

quotes: can you make the rotating element bigger than half the page

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop breakpoints, the rotating circular element renders larger than half of the hero section height (visually dominant and clearly >50%).
On tablet and mobile breakpoints, the rotating circular element scales down responsively (no horizontal scroll, no content overlap, and no element clipping).
The element remains perfectly circular with the existing circular mask behavior intact, and the rotation/pause-on-hover behavior continues to work.

constraints: Do not add or require backend functionality; the site must continue to function as a static build with no server dependencies.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the logo image asset or how it is cropped/masked beyond what is necessary to support the increased size.
Redesigning the overall Home hero layout or changing the site navigation/pages.
